languages.text: Подорвав здоровье неусыпной службой Вольному Торговцу и став еще более толстым, чем прежде, Высокий фактотум Янрис Данрок годами бдел над богатствами династии. В день, когда его тело было обнаружено в кабинете над бумагами, заместитель почтенного Данрока явился к госпо{mf|дину|же} с докладом, состоящим из двух вестей: "Досточтимый Янрис Данрок усоп по естественным причинам ввиду слабости сердца" и "В имущественных делах нареканий нет".

Sacrificing his health in diligent service to the Rogue Trader and letting his waistline expand even more, High Factotum Janris Danrok watched over the dynasty's riches for years. The day his body was found sprawled over paperwork in his office, his assistant came forward with two reports: "The most esteemed Janris Danrok has passed away of natural causes due to complications of a weakened heart," and "As regards your assets, everything is in order."
languages.original_text: Подорвав здоровье неусыпной службой Вольному Торговцу и став еще более толстым, чем прежде, Высокий фактотум Янрис Данрок годами бдел над богатствами династии. В день, когда его тело было обнаружено в кабинете над бумагами, заместитель почтенного Данрока явился к госпо{mf|дину|же} с докладом, состоящим из двух вестей: "Досточтимый Янрис Данрок усоп по естественным причинам ввиду слабости сердца" и "В имущественных делах нареканий нет".

traits.locale_text: Having damaged his health with diligent service to the Rogue Trader, and becoming even bigger than before, High Factotum Janris Danrok for years looked over the riches of the dynasty. The day his body was found in his office lying over business papers, his assistant came to the {mf|master|mistress} with a report, that consisted of two pieces of news: "Most honourable Janris Danrok passed away due to natural causes on account of weak heart," and "No complaints concerning property matters."

Having damaged his health with diligent service to the Rogue Trader, and becoming even bigger than before, High Factotum Janris Danrok for years looked over the riches of the dynasty. The day his body was found in his office lying over business papers, his assistant came to the {mf|master|mistress} with a report, that consisted of two pieces of news: "Most honourable Janris Danrok passed away due to natural causes on account of weak heart," and "No complaints concerning property matters."

Sacrificing his health in diligent service to the Rogue Trader and growing his waistline even more, High Factotum Janris Danrok looked over the dynasty's riches for years. The day his body was found sprawled over paperwork in his office, his assistant came forward with two reports: "The most honourable Janris Danrok has passed away of natural causes due to complications of a weakened heart," and "As for your assets, everything is in order."

Sacrificing his health in diligent service to the Rogue Trader and growing his waistline even more, High Factotum Janris Danrok looked over the dynasty's riches for years. The day his body was found sprawled over paperwork in his office, his assistant came forward with two reports: "The most honourable Janris Danrok has passed away of natural causes due to complications of a weakened heart," and "As for your assets, everything is in order."

Sacrificing his health in diligent service to the Rogue Trader and letting his waistline expand even more, High Factotum Janris Danrok watched over the dynasty's riches for years. The day his body was found sprawled over paperwork in his office, his assistant came forward with two reports: "The most esteemed Janris Danrok has passed away of natural causes due to complications of a weakened heart," and "As regards your assets, everything is in order."

Sacrificing his health in diligent service to the Rogue Trader and letting his waistline expand even more, High Factotum Janris Danrok watched over the dynasty's riches for years. The day his body was found sprawled over paperwork in his office, his assistant came forward with two reports: "The most esteemed Janris Danrok has passed away of natural causes due to complications of a weakened heart," and "As regards your assets, everything is in order."

languages.text: 高阶顾问詹里斯·丹罗克勤勤恳恳地为行商浪人服务，为此牺牲了自己的健康，他的身体也变得越来越富态。多年来，他一直在认真照看王朝的财产，直到他的助手发现他冰冷的尸体伏在办公桌的文件上。在那天，他的助手上交了两份报告——“尊敬的詹里斯·丹罗克由于心脏衰竭导致的并发症而自然死亡。”以及“至于您的财产，仍然井井有条。”
languages.original_text: Sacrificing his health in diligent service to the Rogue Trader and letting his waistline expand even more, High Factotum Janris Danrok watched over the dynasty's riches for years. The day his body was found sprawled over paperwork in his office, his assistant came forward with two reports: "The most esteemed Janris Danrok has passed away of natural causes due to complications of a weakened heart," and "As regards your assets, everything is in order."

traits.locale_text: 高阶顾问詹里斯·丹罗克勤勤恳恳地为行商浪人服务，为此牺牲了自己的健康，他的身体也变得越来越富态。多年来，他一直在认真照看王朝的财产，直到他的助手发现他冰冷的尸体伏在办公桌的文件上。在那天，他的助手上交了两份报告——“尊敬的詹里斯·丹罗克由于心脏衰竭导致的并发症而自然死亡。”以及“至于您的财产，仍然井井有条。”

languages.text: Hoch-Faktotum Janris Danrok opferte für seinen pflichtbewussten Dienst {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} gegenüber seine Gesundheit und ließ seine Taille noch breiter werden. Jahrelang überwachte er die Reichtümer der Dynastie. Als seine Leiche in seinem Büro gefunden wurde, auf einem Stapel Papierkram zusammengesackt, berichtete sein Assistent zweierlei: "Der ehrenwerte Janris Danrok ist eines natürlichen Todes gestorben, bedingt durch ein schwaches Herz" einerseits. "Eure Bücher sind allesamt bestens geführt" andererseits.
languages.original_text: Sacrificing his health in diligent service to the Rogue Trader and letting his waistline expand even more, High Factotum Janris Danrok watched over the dynasty's riches for years. The day his body was found sprawled over paperwork in his office, his assistant came forward with two reports: "The most esteemed Janris Danrok has passed away of natural causes due to complications of a weakened heart," and "As regards your assets, everything is in order."

traits.locale_text: Hoch-Faktotum Janris Danrok opferte für seinen pflichtbewussten Dienst {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} gegenüber seine Gesundheit und ließ seine Hüfte noch breiter werden. Jahrelang überwachte er die Reichtümer der Dynastie. Als seine Leiche in seinem Büro gefunden wurde, auf einem Stapel Papierkram zusammengesackt, berichtete sein Asssistent zweierlei: "Der ehrenwerte Janris Danrok ist eines natürlichen Todes gestorben, bedingt durch ein schwaches Herz" einerseits. "Eure Bücher sind allesamt bestens geführt" andererseits.

languages.text: Pendant des années, le haut factotum Janris Danrok géra diligemment les richesses de la dynastie {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} en sacrifiant sa santé, qui déclinait à mesure que sa corpulence augmentait. Le jour où son corps fut retrouvé gisant sur un lit de paperasse dans son bureau, son assistant présenta deux rapports : « Le très estimé Janris Danrok est décédé de causes naturelles dues à des complications cardiaques », et « Vos actifs, eux, sont en pleine santé ».
languages.original_text: Sacrificing his health in diligent service to the Rogue Trader and letting his waistline expand even more, High Factotum Janris Danrok watched over the dynasty's riches for years. The day his body was found sprawled over paperwork in his office, his assistant came forward with two reports: "The most esteemed Janris Danrok has passed away of natural causes due to complications of a weakened heart," and "As regards your assets, everything is in order."

traits.locale_text: Pendant des années, le haut factotum Janris Danrok géra diligemment les richesses de la dynastie {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} en sacrifiant sa santé, qui déclinait à mesure que sa corpulence augmentait. Le jour où son corps fut retrouvé gisant sur un lit de paperasse dans son bureau, son assistant présenta deux rapports : « Le très honorable Janris Danrok est décédé de causes naturelles dues à des complications cardiaques », et « Vos actifs, eux, sont en pleine santé ».

languages.text: Sacrificando su salud en leal servicio a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y dejando que su rotundo cuerpo se ensanchara aún más, el Sumo Factótum Janris Danrok supervisó las riquezas de la dinastía durante años. El día en que se encontró su cuerpo sin vida tumbado sobre el papeleo de su oficina, su asistente entregó dos informes: «El estimado Janris Danrok ha fallecido por causas naturales debido a las complicaciones de su corazón debilitado» y «En cuanto a sus bienes, todo está en orden».
languages.original_text: Sacrificing his health in diligent service to the Rogue Trader and letting his waistline expand even more, High Factotum Janris Danrok watched over the dynasty's riches for years. The day his body was found sprawled over paperwork in his office, his assistant came forward with two reports: "The most esteemed Janris Danrok has passed away of natural causes due to complications of a weakened heart," and "As regards your assets, everything is in order."

traits.locale_text: Sacrificando su salud en leal servicio a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y ensanchando aún más su rotundo cuerpo, el Sumo Factótum Janris Danrok supervisó las riquezas de la dinastía durante años. El día en que se encontró su cuerpo sin vida tumbado sobre el papeleo de su oficina, su asistente entregó dos informes: «El honorabilísimo Janris Danrok ha fallecido por causas naturales debido a las complicaciones de su corazón debilitado» y «En cuanto a sus bienes, todo está en orden».

languages.text: 自由開拓者に対する熱心な奉仕により健康を犠牲にし、さらに腹囲を大きくしたハイ・ファクトタムのジャンリス・ダンロックは、何年にもわたって王朝の富を見守ってきた。オフィスの書類の上に横たわっている彼の遺体が発見された日、彼のアシスタントが2つの報告書を持ってきた。「最も名誉あるジャンリス・ダンロックは、弱った心臓の合併症により自然死しました」、そして「あなたの資産に関しては、すべて問題ありません」。
languages.original_text: Sacrificing his health in diligent service to the Rogue Trader and letting his waistline expand even more, High Factotum Janris Danrok watched over the dynasty's riches for years. The day his body was found sprawled over paperwork in his office, his assistant came forward with two reports: "The most esteemed Janris Danrok has passed away of natural causes due to complications of a weakened heart," and "As regards your assets, everything is in order."

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者に対する熱心な奉仕により健康を犠牲にし、さらに腹囲を大きくしたハイ・ファクトタムのジャンリス・ダンロックは、何年にもわたって王朝の富を見守ってきた。オフィスの書類の上に横たわっている彼の遺体が発見された日、彼のアシスタントが2つの報告書を持ってきた。「最も名誉あるジャンリス・ダンロックは、弱った心臓の合併症により自然死しました」、そして「あなたの資産に関しては、すべて問題ありません」。

languages.text: Hür Tacir'e tüm gayretiyle hizmet ederken sağlığından olan ve beli daha da kalınlaşan Arşıkâhya Janris Danrok, yıllar boyunca hanedanlığın hazinelerine göz kulak oldu. Ölüsünü ofisindeki evrakların üzerine yayılmış şekilde bulan asistanları, "Çok değerli Janris Danrok, zayıflamış kalbinden doğan komplikasyonlardan kaynaklı doğal sebeplerle vefat etmiştir." ve "Varlıklarınız hususunda ise her şey yolundadır." şeklinde iki rapor iletti.
languages.original_text: Sacrificing his health in diligent service to the Rogue Trader and letting his waistline expand even more, High Factotum Janris Danrok watched over the dynasty's riches for years. The day his body was found sprawled over paperwork in his office, his assistant came forward with two reports: "The most esteemed Janris Danrok has passed away of natural causes due to complications of a weakened heart," and "As regards your assets, everything is in order."

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'e tüm gayretiyle hizmet ederken sağlığından olan ve beli daha da kalınlaşan Arşıkâhya Janris Danrok, yıllar boyunca hanedanlığın hazinelerine göz kulak oldu. Ölüsü, ofisindeki evrakların üzerine yayılmış şekilde bulunduğunda, asistanları iki rapor iletti: "Çok değerli Janris Danrok, zayıflamış kalbinden doğan komplikasyonlardan kaynaklı doğal sebeplerle vefat etmiştir." ve "Varlıklarınız konusunda ise her şey yolundadır.".
